title: mastery 7 token
body: I have had 2 mastery 7 tokens for blitz for quite a while and today I earned S on him and didn't get a token.. why

replies.body: DId you happen to remember which game got you the third S for Blitz? Right now I'm only seeing 2 recent S's, and those were obtained in early Dec and early Nov of last year. Hit me up with the match you think should have gotten you an S and I'll double check for ya!

Sorry it was the same day I posted this it was Jan 22. I posted shortly after cause I was a bit teed off lol. I went 8/4 and legit got an S.. this is not the first time this has happened its the 3rd, but I am not overly concerned with the other 2 but I refuse to be ripped this time.

I don't blame you at all! I checked up on this again and in the last Blitz game you played (1/22) you got an S-. For mastery 7 tokens you need an S or S+, so that one wouldn't have given you a token. Did you happen to have a screenshot or anything showing that it told you it was an S and not S-?
I honestly cannot remember - or + of it so it must of been just - and that's why. Thanks for you're help I guess I'll need to keep trying haha
